subject: Basketball
College Athletics
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: A few blocks from Broadway, Louisville has been cast in the role of spoiler recently at the Big East tournament. And with Connecticut becoming the toast of the town over the past week, the Cardinals found themselves a part of a familiar story line.
snippet: A few blocks from Broadway, Louisville has been cast in the role of spoiler recently at the Big East tournament. And with Connecticut becoming the toast of the town over the past week, the Cardinals found themselves a part of a familiar story line.
